title: "A person's prayer in jungle is 50 times better than praying alone" is it authentic? assim al hakeem
transcript: in 56 I read that whoever performs PR in the jungle is probably 50 times more better than the person who pra in alone so in my city there's a mini Forest Area could say a couple of acres and they have a forestry Institute there so if I were to happen to pray there the condition of the apply to me I don't know the authenticity of this Hadith uh brother Muhammad but to claim that the prayer in the jungle is 50 times better than the prayer in the Masjid or alone did you say the Masjid or alone alone alone alone alone yes I have no idea of any such Hadith whether it's authentic or not again please send me this Hadith on my website so that I can check it out because without knowing authenticity we cannot speak about it logically if it's authentic we have to see what the scholars commented and said about it if it's not authentic alhamdulillah we have no problem in that and Allah Knows Best
